description:
Have your birthday's been disappointing in the past?

Some of the worst days of my life have happened on my birthday.

  • I have had people close to me forget it was my birthday - repeatedly;
  • I have had a series of bad experiences year after year where family didn't celebrate my birthday in ways that were enjoyable to me
  • I have felt a ton of disappointment and sadness on my birthday instead of feeling celebratory and happy

If you have had less-than-happy birthdays in the past, I invite you to take this course and design the ultimate birthday experience.

This course is not about designing a birthday party.

It is about:

  • Designing a day that helps you feel the emotions you desire most
  • Spending your day doing things that bring you joy
  • Putting together a meaningful gift list
  • Celebrating your day and the year that follows with purpose

I use the free software Trello to teach this course and I show you how you can create a similar planning system on your own.

Throughout the course you will see my actual birthday planning board. This is not a random example but a truly honest board with my real plans.

With this course you can design a birthday that meets your expectations for an amazing day. You won't be disappointed.

Click the Take This Course button and I will see you inside.
title: Make Your Next Birthday One Worth Remembering
